Interface MSTC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Instrument, MSTMeter, MultiSensor<TMeter>, TC, TMeter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MSMOTC
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ITC503, LS336

    public interface MSTC
extends TC, MSTMeter

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks whether the given sensor number is valid, throws a DeviceException if not.

      Returns the number of sensors the controller has.

      Returns a virtual TMeter object representing the specified temperature sensor.
      default double getTemperature()
      Returns the temperature reported by the control-loop sensor

      Returns the temperature reported by the specified sensor
      int getUsedSensor()
      Returns the number of the sensor being used for temperature control
      void useSensor(int sensor)
      Tells the controller to use the specified sensor for temperature control
      default void waitForStableTemperature(int sensor, double temperature, double pctMargin, long time)
      Waits until the temperature reported by the specified sensor has remained within the specified percentage margin of the specified temperature for at least the specified time.

      • waitForStableTemperature

        default void waitForStableTemperature(int sensor,
                                      double temperature,
                                      double pctMargin,
                                      long time)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      DeviceException,
                                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits until the temperature reported by the specified sensor has remained within the specified percentage margin of the specified temperature for at least the specified time.
        Parameters:
        sensor - Sensor number
        temperature - Temperature target
        pctMargin - Percentage margin
        time - Duration, in seconds
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Upon communications error
        DeviceException - Upon compatibility error
        java.lang.InterruptedException
